element.short: Each operation can have one ore more header elements
element.definition: Header elements would be used to set HTTP headers.
element.comments: This gives control to test-script writers to set headers explicitly based on test requirements.  It will allow for testing using:  - "If-Modified-Since" and "If-None-Match" headers.  See http://hl7-fhir.github.io/http.html#2.1.0.5.1 - "If-Match" header.  See http://hl7-fhir.github.io/http.html#2.1.0.11 - Conditional Create using "If-None-Exist".  See http://hl7-fhir.github.io/http.html#2.1.0.13.1 - Invalid "Content-Type" header for negative testing. - etc.
